channel.title: Updates on ScrapComputers
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on ScrapComputers

item.title: Bugfix Update: Removing a bugfix to fix a bug!
item.description: We just unimplemented a bugfix as our bugfix. That is not even a joke.

item.title: Update: The Addon System Update
item.description: We just made our add-on system a LOT better than before! After 1 issue we encountered, we have done it!
